WorkItem.Description: A bug in GetRecipientsString in atlmime.h prevents it from ever working. The line 531 in the file of the latest downloadable version, which reads: '*pdwLen = 0; ' must be commented out to get this to work. How this bug got in and was never corrected I will never know.
WorkItem.Summary: Fix to bug in GetRecipientsString in atlmime.h
